sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import proimg1 from "../assets/images/pro_img1.png"; import Slider from "react-slick"; const proSliderList = [ { id:1, proimg: proimg1, productBadge:"Sale", name:"Product name goes here 1", price:"79.00", Cutprice:"300.00", }, { id:2, proimg: proimg1, productBadge:"Sale", name:"Product name goes here 1", price:"79.00", Cutprice:"300.00", }, { id:3, proimg: proimg1, productBadge:"Sale", name:"Product name goes here 1", price:"79.00", Cutprice:"300.00", }, { id:4, proimg: proimg1, productBadge:"Sale", name:"Product name goes here 1", price:"79.00", Cutprice:"300.00", } ]; function ProductSlider() { const settiasngs = { slidesToShow: 4, slidesToScroll: 1, dots: false, arrows: true, centerMode: true }; return (<>

This Week’s Top Selling

{proSliderList.map((proList) => (

(5 Reviews)

{proList.name}

{proList.price}{proList.Cutprice}

 ))}
) }; export default ProductSlider;
